app.name: Verbatim Studio
app.description: A privacy-first application for transcribing audio and video files. All processing happens locally on the user's device - no data is sent to external servers.

navigation.label: Dashboard
navigation.description: Home page with overview statistics, recent recordings, and quick actions

navigation.label: Recordings
navigation.description: Upload and manage audio/video files, start transcriptions, view status

navigation.label: Projects
navigation.description: Organize recordings into groups with shared metadata and analytics

navigation.label: Documents
navigation.description: Upload and manage PDFs and other documents with OCR text extraction

navigation.label: Chats
navigation.description: View and resume saved AI conversation sessions

navigation.label: Search
navigation.description: Global search across recordings, transcripts, documents, and notes

navigation.label: Files
navigation.description: File browser for navigating folder structure and moving files

navigation.label: Settings
navigation.description: Configure transcription, AI models, storage, and app preferences

features.name: Audio/Video Transcription
features.description: Convert audio and video files to text using local WhisperX AI models
steps: Navigate to Recordings in the sidebar
Drag and drop files or click Upload
Enter a title and optional metadata
Wait for status to change to Completed
Click the recording to view the transcript

features.name: Transcript Editing
features.description: Edit transcript text, change speakers, add highlights and comments
steps: Click any segment text to edit
Click speaker label to change speaker
Click highlight icon to color-code segments
Click comment icon to add notes

features.name: Speaker Identification
features.description: Automatically identify and label different speakers in a recording
steps: Rename speakers in the transcript view

features.name: Project Organization
features.description: Group related recordings into projects with custom metadata
steps: Enter name and optional project type
Assign recordings from the Recordings page

features.name: AI Chat Assistant
features.description: Ask questions about your transcripts and documents using AI
steps: Click attachment icon to add context
Type your question and press Enter

features.name: Global Search
features.description: Find content across all recordings, documents, and notes
steps: Click a result to navigate to it

features.name: Live Transcription
features.description: Transcribe speech in real-time from your microphone
steps: Click Save to keep the session

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Upload PDFs and documents with OCR text extraction
steps: View extracted text and add notes

features.name: Backup and Restore
features.description: Export and import full database backups
steps: Click Import to restore from backup

transcription.model: Whisper model size (tiny, base, small, medium, large)
transcription.device: CPU or GPU (CUDA for Nvidia, MPS for Apple Silicon)
transcription.huggingface_token: Required for some models and diarization

ai_llm.models: Download and manage chat AI models
ai_llm.gpu_layers: How much to offload to GPU

storage.locations: Add local, network, or cloud storage

troubleshooting.solution: Navigate to Settings > AI/LLM or Settings > Transcription and download a model
Try converting to MP3/WAV, use a smaller model, or switch to CPU
Use a smaller model (tiny or base), enable GPU acceleration, close other apps
Enable diarization in Settings > Transcription and add HuggingFace token
Check microphone permission, system audio settings, try reconnecting
Download OCR models in Settings > OCR
Ensure AI model is downloaded in Settings > AI/LLM, check connection status
Ensure transcription is complete, check disk space
